name: International Conference on Innovative Teaching and Education
content: Discover the power of innovative learning and teaching at ITECONF â€“ the premier Education conference dedicated to exploring cutting-edge approaches in education. Join us from 21-23 August 2024 in the vibrant city of London, UK, and be part of a global movement that is revolutionizing education. Participants at ITECONF will seize the opportunity to connect with professors, academics, students, educationalists, and anyone passionate about teaching and education from around the world. The Organizing Committee will offer the participants a city tour of London free of charge. All papers will have publication opportunities in the Conference Proceeding (with ISBN and a unique DOI number assigned to each paper) or in indexed international journals indexed with SCOPUS, DOAJ, EBSCO, GOOGLE SCHOLAR, COPERNICUS. The International Conference on Innovative Teaching and Education will be an in-person event and will also include live-stream Virtual sessions for those who cannot join physically but wish to learn and connect. In-person participants and speakers will get a Letter of Invitation after registration.
